description: 181 biotech companies - 48 with curated IR data from presentations

companies.name: Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals
companies.notes: RNAi platform with extra-hepatic delivery (TRiM). View thesis: /companies/ARWR/thesis

companies.name: AbbVie
companies.notes: I&I, Oncology, Neuro. Key products: Humira, Skyrizi, Rinvoq.

companies.name: Amgen
companies.notes: Oncology, I&I, Bone. Key products: Repatha, Prolia, Lumakras.

companies.name: Ardelyx
companies.notes: Nephrology, GI. Key products: Ibsrela, Xphozah.

companies.name: Biogen
companies.notes: Neuropsychiatry. Key products: Leqembi, Spinraza, Tysabri.

companies.name: bluebird bio
companies.notes: Gene Therapy. Key products: Zynteglo, Lyfgenia.

companies.name: BioMarin Pharmaceutical
companies.notes: Rare Disease. Key products: Voxzogo, Palynziq, Roctavian.

companies.name: CRISPR Therapeutics
companies.notes: Rare Disease (Gene Editing). Key product: Casgevy.

companies.name: Exact Sciences
companies.notes: Dx - Oncology. Key products: Cologuard, Oncotype DX.

companies.name: Amicus Therapeutics

companies.name: Guardant Health
companies.notes: Dx - Oncology. Key products: Guardant360, Shield.

companies.name: Gilead Sciences

companies.name: Insmed

companies.name: Ionis Pharmaceuticals

companies.name: Iovance Biotherapeutics

companies.name: Janux Therapeutics
companies.notes: Oncology - T cell engagers. Lead: JANX007.

companies.name: MannKind
companies.notes: Diabetes, Pulmonary. Key products: Afrezza, Tyvaso DPI.

companies.name: Moderna
companies.notes: Vaccines, Oncology, Rare. COVID/RSV vaccines platform.

companies.name: Natera
